# defaultQuery

**Type Property**

The default query to use to retrieve entity property instances.

## Declaration

```swift
static var defaultQuery: Self.DefaultQuery { get }
```

## Discussion

You can create a query that uses identifier, name and more. For additional information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftData/Query].

## Making the entity queryable

- **DefaultQuery**
